body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue ```console $ spack spec -I Input spec -------------------------------- - netcdf-c%intel Concretized -------------------------------- 6t3oitw netcdf-c@4.8.1%intel@2021.5.0~dap~fsync~hdf4~jna+mpi~parallel-netcdf+pic+shared arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake 3f5qhbp ^hdf5@1.12.1%intel@2021.5.0~cxx~fortran+hl~ipo~java+mpi+shared~szip~threadsafe+tools api=default build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake vaamwxe ^cmake@3.22.1%intel@2021.5.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt build_type=Release arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake fvszydy ^openmpi@4.1.2%intel@2021.5.0~atomics~cuda~cxx~cxx_exceptions+gpfs~internal-hwloc~java~legacylaunchers~lustre~memchecker~pmi~pmix+romio~singularity~sqlite3+static~thread_multiple+vt+wrapper-rpath fabrics=none schedulers=none arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake ngg7b3w ^hwloc@2.7.0%intel@2021.5.0~cairo~cuda~gl~libudev+libxml2~netloc~nvml~opencl~pci~rocm+shared arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake yzhd5lj ^libxml2@2.9.12%intel@2021.5.0~python arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake ryeqkgf ^libiconv@1.16%intel@2021.5.0 libs=shared,static arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake o2m7idr ^pkgconf@1.8.0%intel@2021.5.0 arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake f2f5qbo ^xz@5.2.5%intel@2021.5.0~pic libs=shared,static arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake 7p5qeo3 ^zlib@1.2.11%intel@2021.5.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake 4w3au7f ^ncurses@6.2%intel@2021.5.0~symlinks+termlib abi=none arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake numpkta ^libevent@2.1.12%intel@2021.5.0+openssl arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake dk7cwvd ^openssl@1.1.1m%intel@2021.5.0~docs certs=system arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake suea4nh ^perl@5.30.2%intel@2021.5.0~cpanm+shared+threads patches=517afe8ca1cb12f798f20b21583d91463fe3f4fa9244c6c8e054a92c8135da8f arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake dpovadd ^openssh@8.1p1%intel@2021.5.0 arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake wpip7wb ^m4@1.4.19%intel@2021.5.0+sigsegv patches=9dc5fbd0d5cb1037ab1e6d0ecc74a30df218d0a94bdd5a02759a97f62daca573,bfdffa7c2eb01021d5849b36972c069693654ad826c1a20b53534009a4ec7a89 arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake wcr6k3l ^libsigsegv@2.13%intel@2021.5.0 arch=darwin-bigsur-skylake ``` ### Error message
Error message
==> Installing netcdf-c-4.8.1-aq5st4jjdcymcmzxpgknvyvhu42unlkd
==> No binary for netcdf-c-4.8.1-aq5st4jjdcymcmzxpgknvyvhu42unlkd found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /Users/ptb/gitrepos/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/bc/bc018cc30d5da402622bf76462480664c6668b55eb16ba205a0dfb8647161dd0.tar.gz
==> No patches needed for netcdf-c
==> netcdf-c: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> netcdf-c: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> netcdf-c: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j4' 'V=1'

3 errors found in build log:
     985        ../libdispatch/.libs/libdispatch.a(libdispatch_la-dutil.o)
     986        /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2022.0.0/mac/bin/intel64/../../compi
            ler/lib/libimf.a(isinf.o)
     987    duplicate symbol '_isnan' in:
     988        ../libdispatch/.libs/libdispatch.a(libdispatch_la-dutil.o)
     989        /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2022.0.0/mac/bin/intel64/../../compi
            ler/lib/libimf.a(isnan.o)
     990    ld: 2 duplicate symbols for architecture x86_64
  >> 991    make[2]: *** [Makefile:581: libnetcdf.la] Error 1
     992    make[2]: Leaving directory '/private/var/folders/ck/bwzqcv_s1pz1t9f
            c86731shh0000gq/T/ptb/spack-stage/spack-stage-netcdf-c-4.8.1-aq5st4
            jjdcymcmzxpgknvyvhu42unlkd/spack-src/liblib'
  >> 993    make[1]: *** [Makefile:729: all-recursive] Error 1
     994    make[1]: Leaving directory '/private/var/folders/ck/bwzqcv_s1pz1t9f
            c86731shh0000gq/T/ptb/spack-stage/spack-stage-netcdf-c-4.8.1-aq5st4
            jjdcymcmzxpgknvyvhu42unlkd/spack-src'
  >> 995    make: *** [Makefile:574: all] Error 2
### Information on your system * **Spack:** 0.17.1-1120-1e4c08f3a5 * **Python:** 3.9.10 * **Platform:** darwin-bigsur-skylake * **Concretizer:** clingo ### Additional information [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/8179988/spack-build-env.txt) [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/8179989/spack-build-out.txt) maintainers: @WardF @skosukhin ### General information - [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform - [X] I have run `spack maintainers ` and **@mentioned** any maintainers - [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files - [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: netcdf-c %intel@2021.5
